title: Forgotten TB password
content: I'm setting up TB on a new computer. TB keeps asking for my password but the pw I had written down is not correct (it was many years ago). How can I retrieve this password? I have tried my Mozilla account pw and it is not that. Thanks.
creator: mw34

title: Thunderbird136 won't send emails
content:
after installing Tbird136 I could receive but not send emails. Some error message would flash but disappear to quickly to be read.

UPDATE - it turned out to be address book corruption due to the database updating T136 does. I started T136 and exported all my address books then went to the tbird profile and deleted all abook.sqlite files and restarted Tbird and sent emails w/o issues. reimported my exported address books and problem solved.
creator: petermoore1

title: Thunderbird taking 30 or more seconds to send emails
content: I posted this question a while back and the response I got was to start Windows in Safe mode. When I did that I had no internet connection, so obviously it was impossible to test Thunderbird's sending speed. When I posted this reply, no one responded. I read on another forum that the poster had the same problem and had seen a post where it was recommended to change Windows security settings so that it wasn't scanning the Thunderbird logs every time. The poster could no longer find that post although this had had helped him resolve the problem. Does this make any sense to any of you?
creator: s_beecher

title: Repeated Thunderbird email server crashes
content: Good morning. I am pbehrmann@mailfence.com. This is the fifth time my email server has crashed this week. Manu Andino and other support personnel have kindly helped this week. What is the etiology of these repeated crashes? Does Thunderbird have a virus? Is it under repeated cyberattack? My wife has Thunderbird for her email server and she has not had any problems this week. If you can help restart my Thunderbird email server this morning I would appreciate it. Thank you- P.Behrmann
creator: pbehrmann

title: Versuch  e-Mails  zu verschicken führt zuFehlerausschrift
content: Sehr geehrte Berater Seit ca. zwei Wochen führt ein Sendeversuch mit Thunderbird zur Fehlerausschrift: Senden fehlgeschlagen. Der Postausgangsserver kann nicht identifiziert werden. Passwort und Authentifizierungsmethode überprüfen unter Kontoeinstellungen / Postausgangsserver (SMTP) Der SMTP-Server ist mx.freenet.de Was kann ich unternehmen? Die Installation einer weiteren E-Mailadresse von Freenet hat sofort funktioniert! Gruß Dr. Harald Dunke
creator: hathedu

title: Sent emails not showing up in Sent file in Thunderbird
content: My wife primarily uses her ipad using Apples mail app. I also have her email on my laptop (as backup) using Thunderbird. When someone sends and email to her. When she responds the reply displays in her Sent file on her ipad but doesn't on my backup account on my laptop (Thunderbird). If I reply to a message on her backup it displays in the sent file on Thunderbird, as it should Further, after 4 -5 hours the copy of the body of that email is replaced with the message "This message has not been downloaded from the server". I have deleted and recreated the email accounts on both devices. I have contacted both Apple and my ISP. They both confirm that everything is working properly. Please help.
creator: dgvick216
